Here is an updated list of papers related the **`sentometrics`** package, or more broadly about textual sentiment analysis (most of which use the package for underlying calculations). These research projects are carried out by a joint group of collaborators working at the intersection of sentiment analysis and econometrics. 

### Papers

_An extensive introduction to the package_

- Ardia, D., Bluteau, K., Borms, S. & Boudt, K. (2020). **The R package sentometrics to compute, aggregate and predict with textual sentiment**. Forthcoming in Journal of Statistical Software. [Link](https://doi.org/10.2139/ssrn.3067734).

_An overview of the required steps in a typical econometric analysis of sentiment from textual data_

- Algaba, A., Ardia, D., Bluteau, K., Borms & S., Boudt, K. (2020). **Econometrics meets sentiment: An overview of methodology and applications**. Working paper. [Link](https://doi.org/10.2139/ssrn.2652876).

_Empirical applications_

- Borms, S., Boudt, K., Van Holle, F. & Willems, J. (2020). **Semi-supervised text mining for monitoring the news about the ESG performance of companies**. Working paper.

- Algaba, A., Borms, S., Boudt, K. & Verbeken, B. (2020). **Monitoring consumer confidence: A real-time approach using media news articles**. Working paper.

- Algaba, A., Borms, S., Boudt, K. & Van Pelt, J. (2020). **The Economic Policy Uncertainty index for Flanders, Wallonia and Belgium**. Working paper.

- Ardia, D., Bluteau, K. & Boudt, K. (2019). **Media and the stock market: Their relationship and abnormal dynamics around earnings announcements**. Working paper. [Link](http://dx.doi.org/10.2139/ssrn.3192064 ).

- Ardia, D., Bluteau, K. & Boudt, K. (2019). **Questioning the news about economic growth: Sparse forecasting using thousands of news-based sentiment values**. International Journal of Forecasting 35, 1370â€“1386. [Link](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ijforecast.2018.10.010).
